reg_pit.title: Property Transfer Tax Exemption Regulation No. 7

change.changenote: Regulation BEFORE repealed by BC Reg 68/2017, effective March 1, 2017.

reg:regulation.reg:title: Property Transfer Tax Exemption Regulation No. 7

bcl:section.bcl:text: In respect of the transfer to it of the properties listed in Schedule A, the Greater Vancouver Transportation Authority is given exemption from $2 226 955.58 in property transfer tax.
